navigation.scriptsTradeEmpire: U akhar bad u raj sngewbha

hero.title: Sangam
hero.sanskritBlessing: शास्त्रं वा सत्यमेव वा | Shastra wa satyameva wa
hero.sanskritTranslation: Jingieit ha thlen, thlen ha jingieit (jingieit bad thlen ym kaba pynkhana)
hero.subtitle: Ka Maritime Networks ha Ancient South Asia
hero.description: Ka exploration ha confluence ha land, sea, bad culture through archaeological evidence, geological formations, bad textual traditions ki shaphang ka Indian Ocean world.
hero.description2: Ka pynkhana ha land, sea bad culture through archaeological evidence, geological formations bad textual traditions ki bnah ka Indian Ocean world ha ka jingieit pynkhah ruh.

themes.ancientIndiaDesc: हरिहरो हरिः | Ka purani India jingieit bad niam
themes.geologyDesc: Ka jingthaw ha ka bnei bad ka kharai kti
themes.empiresDesc: Ka jingsngewbha bad ka jingwad pynwad
themes.scriptsDesc: प्राचीन लिपि | Ka purani akhar bad ka jingieit ka long
themes.indianOceanDesc: Ka lamlynti sngewbha ha ka um bad ka jingpynwad niam

collections.scriptsTradeEmpire: U akhar bad u raj sngewbha
collections.scriptsTradeEmpireItems: Kandahar jinglong, Kutai Yupa jinglong, Muziris lamlynti sngewbha
collections.scriptsTradeEmpireDesc: Ka pynkadir ha ka sngewbha network purani bad ka jingpynwad akhar
collections.oceanNetworksDesc: Ka sngewbha bad niam jingthaw ha ka Indian Ocean purani
